Class BattleShipGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • BattleShipGUI

  • public class BattleShipGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Class is responsible for constructing two maps and populating them with appropriate data. Class contains methods for updating GUI with new map data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BattleShipGUI(Board user, Board comp)
      Constructor initializes all GUI fields.

      void setTurn(java.lang.Boolean n)
      Change turns to turn off action listener.
      void updateCompGUI()
      Check computer's map for any new hits or misses and update GUI accordingly.
      void updateUserGUI()
      Check user's map for any new hits or misses and update GUI accordingly.
